title: China’s single mothers are teaming up
description: To cope with money pressures and work commitments, single mums are sharing homes, bills and childcare
content:
China’s marriage rate is at record lows and its divorce rate is on the rise – but at least some of the country’s singles are teaming up.
As the cost of living intensifies, single mothers are “search… [+4090 chars]
